gracias.informeEnviado: Your report has been sent successfully.
gracias.msgFormulario1:
Help us to improve! We want to know your opinion about our app.
Fill out this
gracias.msgFormulario3: it will only take a few minutes.

ayuda.descargarPDFBoton: download data sheet in pdf format

informe.campoAsteriscos: Fields accompanied by an asterisk (*) are
informe.msgAyuda:
You will find more information about pests and diseases that
affect the poplar in the help section.
informe.msgValorIncorrecto: Enter a numerical value between 1 and 100
informe.ayuda1: Number of trees damaged: 1, 2-10, 10-100, more than 100.
informe.ayuda2: Percentage of trees affected with respect to the total plot (approximate).
informe.ayuda3: 0-25% (if it affects between 0-25% of the tree (crown or trunk, depending on the damage observed)), 25-75% (if it affects 25-75%), and more than 75% (if it affects 75%)).
informe.ayuda4: You can include the type of poplar clone and its age, as well as a description of the damage complementary to what is seen in the photo.
